name: THE UGANDAN WARRIOR or DO YOU KNOW DA WEI?
name_original: THE UGANDAN WARRIOR or DO YOU KNOW DA WEI?
description:
*Cluck Cluck Cluck Cluck Cluck*

"THE UGANDAN WARRIOR or DO YOU KNOW DA WAY?" is a casual-2d-adventure game with exiting plot, unusual setting
and spectacular graphics!

Join the little Ugandan warrior in his fantastic adventures in bizarre world.
Try to avoid enemies or better yet, spit on them, collect t-podes, save Queen and
find da way!

And don't forget, my Brudha: It is not gay if it is de way...

Features:

- Amazing plot
- Magnificent art
- Original soundtrack
- Intuitive and simple gameplay
- Levels very nice
- Ebola *sniff**sniff*
- WHY ARE YOU RUNNING?
- Clucking
- Spitting
- Rich Story
- Incredible journey
- Press f to pay respect wahmen
